      • defaultRecipeGetRemainingItems

        public static ItemStack[] defaultRecipeGetRemainingItems(InventoryCrafting inv)
        Default implementation of IRecipe.getRemainingItems {getRemainingItems} because this is just copy pasted over a lot of recipes. Another use case for java 8 but sadly we can't use it!
        Parameters:
        inv - Crafting inventory
        Returns:
        Crafting inventory contents after the recipe.
